name: Interactive Landscapes #1: The Moon
description:
Explore the Moon and relax! If you want an objective, complete everything on your to-do list. 

This game has no end goal. It's done when you want it to be done, and there's nothing to avoid. Take it as you want. 

Controls: 

AD- Left & Right Movement

Space- Jump

W- Look Up

S- Crouch

E- Mine Walls

Q- Enter Doors

123- Change Music
